abstracts.cdata!:
The Bahia Sustainable Rural Development
            Project of Brazil will strengthen the commitment, strategy
            and actions of the Government to move forward in eradicating
            extreme poverty, promoting actions and investments for the
            provision of water infrastructure and income generation in
            rural areas. The project adheres to principles and adopt the
            necessary measures to ensure that the social and economic
            risks potentially associated with processes of involuntary
            resettlement are avoided, minimized or mitigated in its
            community investment. For these principles when land
            acquisition is necessary for the achievement of their
            community investments, the project will favor donation
            process of voluntary goods and ensure that it is effectively
            given without coercion. When this alternative is not viable,
            the project will adopt the necessary measures seeking
            restoration of the families' quality of life.
